voiceNotes.script: Hey baby... I've been thinking about you all day. Can't wait to show you what I'm wearing underneath...

*soft moans* Oh... that feels so good... don't stop...

*heavy breathing and moans* Yes... just like that... oh god... you feel amazing...
Fuck me harder... I want to feel all of you... don't hold back...
